languages.text: "Приветствую, Вольный Торговец," {n}— холодный женский голос раздается из вокс-системы когитатора, и перед вами предстает пышная дама, лицо которой полностью сокрыто за вуалью глубокого пурпурного оттенка.{/n} "Мое имя Циретта-Мелина Орселлио. После {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RegenExecuted}несвоевременной кончины Ааронто Орселлио{/d} во время посещения вашего мира-столицы мне выпала честь занять место Великого Регента Дома Орселлио. Мои советники были против обращения к вам, однако сложно не считаться с Вольным Торговцем, что держит подле себя наше священное Дитя". {n}В тоне навигатора сквозит неприязнь.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Приветствую, Вольный Торговец," {n}- холодный женский голос раздается из вокс-системы когитатора, и перед вами предстает пышная дама, лицо которой полностью сокрыто за вуалью глубокого пурпурного оттенка.{/n} "Мое имя Циретта-Мелина Орселлио. После несвоевременной кончины Ааронто Орселлио во время посещения вашего мира-столицы мне выпала честь занять место Великого Регента Дома Орселлио. Мои советники были против обращения к вам, однако сложно не считаться с Вольным Торговцем, что держит подле себя наше священное Дитя". {n}В тоне Навигатора сквозит неприязнь.{/n}

languages.text: "Greetings, Rogue Trader." {n}A cold female voice comes from the cogitator's vox-system, and you see a voluptuous woman whose face is completely hidden behind a veil of deep purple.{/n} "My name is Ciretta-Melina Orsellio. After {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RegenExecuted}Aaronto Orsellio's untimely demise{/d} during his visit to your capital world I was offered the honour of taking the seat of the Great Regent of House Orsellio. My advisors spoke against contacting you, but disregarding a Rogue Trader who is keeping our sacred Child by {mf|his|her} side is simply not possible." {n}The Navigator's voice is dripping with obvious animosity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Greetings, Rogue Trader," {n}— a chilly female voice comes from the cogitator's vox-system, and you see a voluptuous dame whose face is completely hidden behind a veil of deep purple.{/n} "My name is Ciretta-Melina Orsellio. After Aaronto Orsellio's untimely demise during his visit to your capital world I was offered the honour of taking the seat of the Great Regent of House Orsellio. My advisors spoke against contacting you, but disregarding a Rogue Trader who is keeping our sacred Child by {mf|his|her} side is simply not possible." {n}The Navigator's voice is dripping with obvious animosity.{/n}

"Greetings, Rogue Trader." {n}A cold female voice comes from the cogitator's vox-system, and you see a voluptuous woman whose face is completely hidden behind a veil of deep purple.{/n} "My name is Ciretta-Melina Orsellio. After {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RegenExecuted}Aaronto Orsellio's untimely demise{/d} during his visit to your capital world I was offered the honour of taking the seat of the Great Regent of House Orsellio. My advisors spoke against contacting you, but disregarding a Rogue Trader who is keeping our sacred Child by {mf|his|her} side is simply not possible." {n}The Navigator's voice is dripping with obvious animosity.{/n}

languages.text: “您好，行商浪人。”{n}沉思者的音阵系统中传来了冰冷的女性声音。你眼前出现了一个性感的女人，她的面容完全隐藏在深紫色的面纱后面。{/n}“我的名字叫做塞蕾塔·梅琳娜·奥赛罗。当{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RegenExecuted}摄政王阿伦托·奥赛罗造访您的首都世界，不幸离世之后{/d}，我有幸成为了奥赛罗家族的大摄政王。我的顾问反对我与您取得联系，然而，我们不可能忽视与圣子同行的行商浪人。”{n}导航者的声音中充满了明显的敌意。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Greetings, Rogue Trader." {n}A cold female voice comes from the cogitator's vox-system, and you see a voluptuous woman whose face is completely hidden behind a veil of deep purple.{/n} "My name is Ciretta-Melina Orsellio. After {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RegenExecuted}Aaronto Orsellio's untimely demise{/d} during his visit to your capital world I was offered the honour of taking the seat of the Great Regent of House Orsellio. My advisors spoke against contacting you, but disregarding a Rogue Trader who is keeping our sacred Child by {mf|his|her} side is simply not possible." {n}The Navigator's voice is dripping with obvious animosity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “您好，行商浪人。”{n}沉思者的音阵系统中传来了冰冷的女性声音。你眼前出现了一个性感的女人，她的面容完全隐藏在深紫色的面纱后面。{/n}“我的名字叫做塞蕾塔·梅琳娜·奥赛罗。当{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RegenExecuted}摄政王阿伦托·奥赛罗造访您的首都世界，不幸离世之后{/d}，我有幸成为了奥赛罗家族的大摄政王。我的顾问反对我与您取得联系，然而，我们不可能忽视与圣子同行的行商浪人。”{n}导航者的声音中充满了明显的敌意。{/n}

languages.text: « Salutations, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, » {n}dit une voix féminine glaciale diffusée par le système-vox. Vous voyez alors apparaître une femme voluptueuse au visage entièrement dissimulé par un voile violet.{/n} « Je m'appelle Ciretta-Mélina Orsellio. Après le {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RegenExecuted}décès brutal d'Aaronto Orsellio{/d} lors de sa visite sur votre monde-capitale, j'ai eu l'insigne honneur d'être nommée vénérable régente de la maison Orsellio. Mes conseillers souhaitaient que je m'abstienne de vous contacter, mais il est impossible de faire abstraction {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} qui garde notre Enfant sacrée à ses côtés. » {n}La voix de la navigatrice est empreinte d'une animosité manifeste.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Greetings, Rogue Trader." {n}A cold female voice comes from the cogitator's vox-system, and you see a voluptuous woman whose face is completely hidden behind a veil of deep purple.{/n} "My name is Ciretta-Melina Orsellio. After {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RegenExecuted}Aaronto Orsellio's untimely demise{/d} during his visit to your capital world I was offered the honour of taking the seat of the Great Regent of House Orsellio. My advisors spoke against contacting you, but disregarding a Rogue Trader who is keeping our sacred Child by {mf|his|her} side is simply not possible." {n}The Navigator's voice is dripping with obvious animosity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Salutations, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, » {n}dit une voix féminine glaciale diffusée par le système-vox. Vous voyez alors apparaître une femme voluptueuse au visage entièrement dissimulé par un voile violet.{/n} « Je m'appelle Ciretta-Mélina Orsellio. Après le {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RegenExecuted}décès brutal d'Aaronto Orsellio{/d} lors de sa visite sur votre monde-capitale, j'ai eu l'insigne honneur d'être nommée vénérable régente de la maison Orsellio. Mes conseillers souhaitaient que je m'abstienne de vous contacter, mais il est impossible de faire abstraction {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} qui garde notre Enfant sacrée à ses côtés. » {n}La voix de la navigatrice est empreinte d'une animosité manifeste.{/n}

languages.text: «Saludos, Comerciante Independiente». {n}El sistema de voco emite una fría voz femenina, y ves a una mujer voluptuosa con la cara completamente oculta tras un velo teñido de un intenso púrpura.{/n} «Me llamo Ciretta-Melina Orsellio. Tras la {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RegenExecuted}inesperada pérdida de Aaronto Orsellio{/d} durante su visita a su mundo capital, me concedieron el honor de asumir el cargo de Gran Regente de la casa Orsellio. Mis consejeros me recomendaron que no hablase con usted, pero no puedo ignorar el hecho de que {mf|un|una} Comerciante Independiente tenga a nuestra niña sagrada bajo su yugo». {n}La navegante habla con un tono de evidente resentimiento.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Greetings, Rogue Trader." {n}A cold female voice comes from the cogitator's vox-system, and you see a voluptuous woman whose face is completely hidden behind a veil of deep purple.{/n} "My name is Ciretta-Melina Orsellio. After {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RegenExecuted}Aaronto Orsellio's untimely demise{/d} during his visit to your capital world I was offered the honour of taking the seat of the Great Regent of House Orsellio. My advisors spoke against contacting you, but disregarding a Rogue Trader who is keeping our sacred Child by {mf|his|her} side is simply not possible." {n}The Navigator's voice is dripping with obvious animosity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Saludos, Comerciante Independiente». {n}El sistema de voco emite una fría voz femenina, y ves a una mujer voluptuosa con la cara completamente oculta tras un velo teñido de un intenso púrpura.{/n} «Me llamo Ciretta-Melina Orsellio. Tras la {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RegenExecuted}inesperada pérdida de Aaronto Orsellio{/d} durante su visita a su mundo capital, me concedieron el honor de asumir el cargo de Gran Regente de la casa Orsellio. Mis consejeros me recomendaron que no hablase con usted, pero no puedo ignorar el hecho de que {mf|un|una} Comerciante Independiente tenga a nuestra niña sagrada bajo su yugo». {n}La navegante habla con un tono de evidente resentimiento.{/n}

languages.text: 「ごきげんよう、自由開拓者」{n}冷たい女の声が考算機のヴォクス・システムから響くと、深い紫のヴェールで顔を完全に隠した豊満な女性があなたの前に現れた。{/n}「私の名はチレッタ＝メリーナ・オーセリオ。{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RegenExecuted}アーロント・オーセリオがあなたの首都惑星訪問中に早すぎる死を遂げた後{/d}、オーセリオ家のグレート・リージェントの座に就く栄誉を与えられた者です。私の助言者たちはあなた方と接触することに反対していましたが、私たちの神聖な御子を守ってくれている自由開拓者を無視することは、とうていできませんでした」{n}航宙士の声には明らかな敵意がこもっている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Greetings, Rogue Trader." {n}A cold female voice comes from the cogitator's vox-system, and you see a voluptuous woman whose face is completely hidden behind a veil of deep purple.{/n} "My name is Ciretta-Melina Orsellio. After {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RegenExecuted}Aaronto Orsellio's untimely demise{/d} during his visit to your capital world I was offered the honour of taking the seat of the Great Regent of House Orsellio. My advisors spoke against contacting you, but disregarding a Rogue Trader who is keeping our sacred Child by {mf|his|her} side is simply not possible." {n}The Navigator's voice is dripping with obvious animosity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ごきげんよう、自由開拓者」{n}冷たい女の声が考算機のヴォクス・システムから響くと、深い紫のヴェールで顔を完全に隠した豊満な女性があなたの前に現れた。{/n}「私の名はチレッタ＝メリーナ・オーセリオ。{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RegenExecuted}アーロント・オーセリオがあなたの首都惑星訪問中に早すぎる死を遂げた後{/d}、オーセリオ家のグレート・リージェントの座に就く栄誉を与えられた者です。私の助言者たちはあなた方と接触することに反対していましたが、私たちの神聖な御子を守ってくれている自由開拓者を無視することは、とうていできませんでした」{n}航宙士の声には明らかな敵意がこもっている。{/n}

languages.text: "Seid gegrüßt, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}." {n} Das Voxsystem des Cogitators gibt die kalte Stimme einer Frau aus und du erblickst eine Dame mit üppigen Kurven, deren Gesicht sich hinter einem dunkelvioletten Schleier verbirgt.{/n} "Ich heiße Ciretta-Melina Orsellio. Nach {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RegenExecuted}Aaronto Orsellios frühzeitigem Ableben{/d} während seines Besuchs auf Eurer Hauptwelt wurde mir die Ehre zuteil, den Sitz des Großregenten des Hauses Orsellio zu übernehmen. Meine Berater sprachen sich dagegen aus, Euch zu kontaktieren, aber es ist schier unmöglich, {mf|einen Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin} mit unserem Kind an {mf|seiner|ihrer} Seite zu ignorieren." {n}Die Stimme der Navigatorin trieft vor offener Feindseligkeit.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Greetings, Rogue Trader." {n}A cold female voice comes from the cogitator's vox-system, and you see a voluptuous woman whose face is completely hidden behind a veil of deep purple.{/n} "My name is Ciretta-Melina Orsellio. After {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RegenExecuted}Aaronto Orsellio's untimely demise{/d} during his visit to your capital world I was offered the honour of taking the seat of the Great Regent of House Orsellio. My advisors spoke against contacting you, but disregarding a Rogue Trader who is keeping our sacred Child by {mf|his|her} side is simply not possible." {n}The Navigator's voice is dripping with obvious animosity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Seid gegrüßt, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}." {n} Das Voxsystem des Cogitators gibt die kühle Stimme einer Frau aus und du erblickst eine Dame mit üppigen Kurven, deren Gesicht sich hinter einem dunkelvioletten Schleier verbirgt.{/n} "Ich heiße Ciretta-Melina Orsellio. Nach Aaronto Orsellios frühzeitigem Ableben während seines Besuchs auf Eurer Hauptwelt wurde mir die Ehre zuteil, den Sitz des Großregenten des Hauses Orsellio zu übernehmen. Meine Berater sprachen sich dagegen aus, Euch zu kontaktieren, aber es ist schier unmöglich, {mf|einen Freihändler|eine Feihändlerin} mit unserem Kind an {mf|seiner|ihrer} Seite zu ignorieren." {n}Die Stimme der Navigatorin trieft vor offener Feindseligkeit.{/n}

"Seid gegrüßt, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}." {n} Das Voxsystem des Cogitators gibt die kühle Stimme einer Frau aus und du erblickst eine Dame mit üppigen Kurven, deren Gesicht sich hinter einem dunkelvioletten Schleier verbirgt.{/n} "Ich heiße Ciretta-Melina Orsellio. Nach Aaronto Orsellios frühzeitigem Ableben während seines Besuchs auf Eurer Hauptwelt wurde mir die Ehre zuteil, den Sitz des Großregenten des Hauses Orsellio zu übernehmen. Meine Berater sprachen sich dagegen aus, Euch zu kontaktieren, aber es ist schier unmöglich, {mf|einen Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin} mit unserem Kind an {mf|seiner|ihrer} Seite zu ignorieren." {n}Die Stimme der Navigatorin trieft vor offener Feindseligkeit.{/n}

languages.text: "Merhaba Lord Kaptan." {n}Kavramsayarın voks sisteminden bir kadının soğuk sesi geliyor, yüzünü koyu mor bir örtünün ardında saklayan çekici bir kadın beliriyor.{/n} "Adım Ciretta-Melina Orsellio. Başdünyanıza gerçekleştirdiği ziyaret esnasında {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RegenExecuted}vakitsizce ölen Aaronto Orsellio'nun{/d} haberi bize ulaşınca Orsellio Hanesi'nin Yüce Naibi olma şerefi bana bahşedildi. Danışmanlarıma kalsa sizinle hiç iletişim kurmamam gerekirmiş ama kutsalımız olan Çocuk sizin yanınızdayken Hür Tacir'i görmezden gelmek olmaz." {n}Rotacı'nın sesinden besbelli kin damlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Greetings, Rogue Trader." {n}A cold female voice comes from the cogitator's vox-system, and you see a voluptuous woman whose face is completely hidden behind a veil of deep purple.{/n} "My name is Ciretta-Melina Orsellio. After {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RegenExecuted}Aaronto Orsellio's untimely demise{/d} during his visit to your capital world I was offered the honour of taking the seat of the Great Regent of House Orsellio. My advisors spoke against contacting you, but disregarding a Rogue Trader who is keeping our sacred Child by {mf|his|her} side is simply not possible." {n}The Navigator's voice is dripping with obvious animosity.{/n}
